single_crochet x2 decrease x2 11 39 decrease x2 single_crochet x3 decrease x2 7 f0 weave through remaining 7 stitches cinch to 17 close tie off and bring tail and knot to the inside finishing back foot placement is easy as the body was made to fit exactly just like the front legs you can move them in or out to get your desired effect i moved mine slightly to the outside as i wanted to see a bit more of those cute little kitty toes below you can see the placement i chose for back feet and tail 18 tilting the head slightly up as in stargazing lets elon be displayed on a table desk or even the floor without loosing the ability to see his face payton sage s elon stargazer©november 2019 *you may do whatever you wish with your finished elon do not reproduce sell or claim this pattern in full or in part as your own if you sell finished elon
